title: Kristin Has Questions For Adoptive Parents
description:
Kristin has been very transparent about her IVF journey over the years. It was successful, and now she has a one-year-old son. She's enjoying motherhood, and now she and her husband have started to consider adoption. 
She knows this is time consuming, and a lot of research is need before making this move. So what should Kristin know about adoption?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
